additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Bear & Bristle Travel Trimmer includes : 1x AA Battery, 1x Adjustable Comb, Cleaning Brush.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: * Do not immerse trimmer in water or other liquids or allow it to get wet. * Do not use in the bath, shower, or near basins or other vessels containing water. * Do not wash trimmer with water. * Do not use trimmer to cut anything other than body hair. * Keep cutting blades clean with the brush provided. * Take care to avoid contact between the moving blades of the unit and the skin, paying particular attention to the face, neck and hands.

description: **Hard alloy steel blades ensure a precise cut every time.** Equipped with an adjustable attachment comb, choose from 5 lengths to get the look you are after.** Operated on 1x AA Alkaline battery (included). Take your trimmer anywhere you go for the ultimate convenience!
name: Trimmer Travel
